identification.author: V B Coen FBCS, FIDM, FIDPM, For Applewood Computers.

performStatements.condition:
k from 1 by 1 until k > i
              if  il-type (k) not = "D"
                  add il-net (k)  to  ih-net
                  add il-vat (k) to  ih-vat
     end-perform
     move

k from 1 by 1 until k > i
              if  il-type (k) not = "D"
                  add il-net (k)  to  ih-net
                  add il-vat (k) to  ih-vat
     end-perform
     move     ih-net  to  display-9
z from i by 1 until z > 39

z from i by 1 until z > 39
              move invoice-line (z + 1) to invoice-line (z)
              move z to il-line (z)
     end-perform
*>
     move     zero to z

validations.errorHandling:
move  ws-env-lines   to ws-lines
     end-if
     subtract 1 from ws-lines giving ws-23-lines

subtract  8  from  i
                    go to  get-data-1-Main

If     Vat-Code-X = "R"                   *> Reduced  code 2 (05% - 21/08/25)
              move 2 to Vat-Code
        else
         If   Vat-Code-X = "Z"                   *> Zero     code 3 (00% - 2

If     Vat-Code-X = "R"                   *> Reduced  code 2 (05% - 21/08/25)
              move 2 to Vat-Code
        else
         If   Vat-Code-X = "Z"                   *> Zero     code 3 (00% - 21/08/25)
              move 3 to Vat-Code

If   Vat-Code-X = "Z"                   *> Zero     code 3 (00% - 21/08/25)
              move 3 to Vat-Code

move VAT-Rate (Vat-Code) to WS-VAT-Rate
              compute  Amt-OK6 rounded = (WS-Net * WS-VAT-Rate) / 100
display space at line ws-23-lines col 01 with erase eol
